head.title: Download and Install Eigen in Build Directory

meta.name: description
meta.content: Download and Install Eigen in Build Directory

html.body:
Prev Next
Index-> contents reference index search external
Up-> CppAD Install cmake eigen_prefix get_eigen.sh
Install-> download cmake cmake_check pkgconfig InstallUnix
cmake-> adolc_prefix colpack_prefix eigen_prefix fadbad_prefix ipopt_prefix sacado_prefix cppad_testvector
eigen_prefix-> get_eigen.sh
get_eigen.sh
Headings-> Syntax Purpose Distribution Directory External Directory Prefix Directory Reuse
Download and Install Eigen in Build Directory
Syntax
bin/get_eigen.sh
Purpose
If you are using Unix, this command will download and install Eigen in the CppAD build directory.
Distribution Directory
This command must be executed in the distribution directory .
External Directory
The Eigen source code is downloaded into the sub-directory build/external below the distribution directory.
Prefix Directory
The Eigen include files are installed in the sub-directory build/prefix/include/Eigen below the distribution directory.
Reuse
The file build/external/eigen-version.tar.gz
and the directory build/external/eigen-version
will be reused if they exist. Delete this file and directory to get a complete rebuild.
Input File: bin/get_eigen.sh
